name: Ruins of Darkness
description:
Story

Ruins of Darkness is an adventure in a world dominated by the Dark plague. Darkness has unleashed its byproducts everywhere to consume the world's purity. The adventure begins when a chosen character is called to liberate the world. The brave character has to create his path towards the Darkness' source, by solving puzzles and riddles, but the Darkness has its own plans.

Controls

  • Character can move around with point-and-click (right click) mechanic
  • Zoom in/out using the mouse wheel scrolling
  • With right click on enemies, character can perform basic attack
  • Abilities can be activated using the Q W E R keys (description is available in-game by hovering the ability's icon).

Additional info

  • The first loading of the game in the browser takes a while, please be patient :)
  • The game can also be downloaded to play it on your pc
  • Made from scratch for the Unity Developers Community Jam #21
  • Made from a team of two peoples

Special thanks to the creators of the free assets that we have used (detailed credits are available in-game)!
